testcase.name: PQ-TC-2144 - Verify the wishlist functionality
testcase.failure:
Given I am on the WestwingNow home page.....................................passed When I search for "mobel"...................................................passed Then I should see product listing page with a list of products..............passed When I click on wishlist icon of the first found product....................passed Then I should see the login or registration overlay.........................passed When I switch to login form of the overlay..................................passed And I log in with email "hsbanga@yahoo.com" and password "Harry@2426" credentials.passed Then the product should be added to the wishlist............................failed And I go to the wishlist page...............................................skipped And I delete the product from my wishlist...................................skipped
